title: SOMEONE Needs to address this...
body:
Hi.

So I'm very sorry if this gets a bit ranty and off base from my generally lighthearted posts, but this shit has been bothering me since I've started playing League, and no one has ever even mentioned this before. 

INTENTIONALLY FEEDING IS NOT GOING 4/10 AS SION SUPPORT. INTENTIONAL FEEDING IS NOT GOING 6/10 ON GRAGAS MID. FEEDING IS **_IN-FUCKING-TENTIONAL_** . 

Wow who woulda fucking guessed.  Seems obvious enough, but you would be surprised how many people are still unaware of this. Usually, if a player is not doing well, they are generally on tilt. Shouting in all caps to everyone in the game to "REPORT FOR INTEIONTAL FEDIN?G wejmromweg OMFG" DOES NOT HELP. In fact, sometimes it can put them EVEN MORE ON TILT. I've personally witnessed this LOSE GAMES. So please, if you're a person who does this, kindly stop.
